property.name: Rules
property.value: {YOBINION} (You may reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a creature that costs less than this spell. Put that creature. Shuffle the rest and put them on the bottom of your deck.) ■ Choose one of the following: ► Break a shield. ► Each of your creatures gets "speed attacker" until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {HYPER ENERGY} (As you summon this creature, you may tap any number of your creatures that have different costs. For each creature you tapped in this way, this creature costs 2 less to summon. It can't cost less than 1.) {TRIPLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Varavariety 3: Slayer (If you have 3 or more elements that have different costs, whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature that costs more than the number of cards in your mana zone, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose one of your opponent's non-Dragon elements that costs 6 or less and destroy it. TWINPACT {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy all non-Dragon elements that cost 3 or less.

property.name: Rules1
Rules2
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy all non-Dragon elements that cost 3 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then return up to 2 evolution creatures from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARDMAN} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature from your other creatures to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ During your opponent's turn, whenever your opponent puts a creature for no cost, you may have that creature battle this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, tap all non-colorless creatures.
